Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells stably expressing DMT1 either singly or in combination with wild type or mutant α-synuclein.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Enhanced Fe²⁺ uptake and oxidative stress
Readout description.Result Description: DMT1 overexpression led to increased Fe²⁺ uptake, oxidative stress, DNA damage, and autophagy-related cell death.
Mutant α-synuclein disrupted autophagy pathways, contributing to neurodegeneration.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein expression used as a control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or non-transfected cells used as a control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal cellular function without Fe²⁺ overload or oxidative stress.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant Fe²⁺ uptake (>200% baseline), oxidative stress markers (>1.5× baseline), or DNA damage (>30% baseline).
